meta.job_title: Sports/Talk Brand Manager and Operations Assistant

duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise, direct, and manage all station personnel functions with a focus on program coordination, content development, promotions, and multi-media strategies.
Recruit, hire, train, and supervise part-time programming staff across all Audacy Rochester Stations.
Act as a liaison between programming and engineering departments, facilitate technical execution, and adopt new technology rollouts.
Demonstrate the importance of the station's relationship with the local community and ensure that programming strategies meet audience needs and local interests.
Ensure adherence to Company program standards and FCC regulations, and provide rating analysis and reporting.
Supervise the use of syndicated and/or outside services, and perform other duties as required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree (Master’s preferred) in Radio Programming, Management, or a related field
